description:
During his adventures Hunahpu will fight against numerous enemies, find new friends and solve complicated puzzles. By the search and the rescue of his brother from the paws of mechanical monster Hunahpu would need his power, intelligence and the cunning force.

Game features:
- Complicated brain teasers and puzzles
- Dangerous enemies
- Pursuits on the dinosaurs and rockets
- Flights with a rocket belt
- 40 levels with different patterns of passing
- The difficulty sometimes makes you want to ragequit
name: Hunahpu Quest. Mechanoid
